mapper.select: select tm.*,u.nickname from t_members tm left join users u on tm.user_id=u.user_id where team_id=#{teamId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_members (leader_check, team_id, user_id, created_time) values(#{leaderCheck}, #{teamId}, #{userId}, systimestamp)
mapper.delete: delete from t_members where team_id=#{teamId} and user_id=#{userId}
